DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test effectiveness , safety , tolerability drug combination carboplatin , paclitaxel , bevacizumab ( Avastin ) patient advanced stage endometrial carcinoma . This phase II , open label , single center study . Patients receive carboplatin , paclitaxel , bevacizumab outpatient center intravenous administration . The primary objective study progression free survival 24 month initiation treatment determine toxicity profile drug combination . The secondary objective estimate overall survival tumor response group patient .
